name: paloalto-enterprise-dlp
label: Palo Alto Enterprise DLP
description: Palo Alto Enterprise DLP discovers and protects company data across every data channel and repository.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server
fields.description: Specify the URL of the Palo Alto Enterprise DLP server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the Palo Alto Enterprise DLP server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Client ID
fields.tooltip: Specify the client ID to access the Palo Alto Enterprise DLP server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: client_id
fields.description: Specify the client ID to access the Palo Alto Enterprise DLP server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Client Secret
fields.tooltip: Specify the client secret to access the Palo Alto Enterprise DLP server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: client_secret
fields.description: Specify the client secret to access the Palo Alto Enterprise DLP server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.

operations.description: Retrieves the specific report information from Palo Alto Enterprise DLP based on the report ID you have specified.
operations.title: Get Report Details

parameters.title: Report ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the report based on which you want to retrieve details from Palo Alto Enterprise DLP.
parameters.name: report_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the account based on which you want to retrieve details from Palo Alto Enterprise DLP.

parameters.title: Fetch Snippets
parameters.description: Select the option, if you want to retrieves snippets from the DLP report. By default, it set as True.
parameters.name: fetchSnippets
parameters.tooltip: Select the option, if you want to retrieves snippets from the DLP report. By default, it set as True.
